We've compiled some useful links to supplement your analytics courses at Kellogg. Check back regularly to get updates. Also, if you have suggestions or recommendations, please reach out to kda-club@kellogg.northwestern.edu!

## Essential Analytical Concepts

####Data Storytelling

  * [Harvard Business Review on Data Storytelling](https://hbr.org/2013/04/how-to-tell-a-story-with-data): high-level introduction to data storytelling
  * [Tableau Data Storytelling White Paper](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/whitepapers/whitepaper_best-practices_telling_great_stories.pdf?signin=8073eedb22fc0a5ae7f82ecf4f280b9): detailed overview of best practices for data storytelling
  * [FiveThirtyEight](http://fivethirtyeight.com/): popular example of data journalism


####Data Visualization

  * [Tableau License](https://www.tableau.com/academic/students): FREE Tableau license for students!
  * [Data Visualization Best Practices](https://medium.com/towards-data-science/the-dos-and-don-ts-of-chart-making-13c629456027): how to design great charts and visuals
  * [Flowing Data](http://flowingdata.com/): data visualization blog for inspiration


####Descriptive and Inferential Statistics

  * [Laerd Stats Introduction](https://statistics.laerd.com/statistical-guides/descriptive-inferential-statistics.php): defining the difference between descriptive and inferential statistics
  * [Descriptive Stats](https://www.investopedia.com/terms/d/descriptive_statistics.asp): more on descriptive statistics
  * [Inferential Stats](http://my.fit.edu/~gabrenya/IntroMethods/eBook/inferentials.pdf): more on inferential statistics


####Linear Regression (because DECS-430/431 was so long ago...)

  * [Investopedia on Linear Regression](https://www.investopedia.com/articles/financial-theory/09/regression-analysis-basics-business.asp): basic introduction to linear regression for business analysts
  * [Khan Academy on Linear Regression](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yMgFHbjbAW8): basic introduction for those who don't like reading
